dcterms:creator: M. Cordts
M. Omran

T. Rehfeld
M. Enzweiler
R. Benenson
U. Franke

B. Schiele
dcterms:description: A dataset for semantic urban scene understanding with pixel-wise annotations of 30 classes. It contains a high variability of both static and dynamic categories, making it suitable for semantic segmentation tasks.
dcterms:title: Cityscapes Dataset

dcterms:creator: Lorenzo Berlincioni
Federico Becattini
Leonardo Galteri
Lorenzo Seidenari
Alberto Del Bimbo
dcterms:description: A synthetically generated dataset using the CARLA simulator, consisting of perfectly aligned pairs of semantic segmentations with and without dynamic objects. It is designed for evaluating semantic segmentation inpainting tasks.
dcterms:title: MICC-SRI (Semantic Road Inpainting) Dataset
